item.title: 关于我
item.description: 基本信息 男，00后，微胖，内向，爱做白日梦，玩原神、Minecraft，发烧友，半吊子科技宅 教育经历 本科：东北大学 联系方式 Github： stceum

item.title: Debian sid with systemd on WSL2
item.description: This is the backup page for Debian sid with systemd on WSL2 written by fardjad Connet me if this page bothers you and I will delete it. Debian sid with systemd on WSL2 Instructions for running Debian sid with systemd on WSL2 Instructions Make sure you’re running Windows 10 Build 19041+ (run ver) Enable the Windows Subsystem for Linux (reboot if needed): # In an elevated PowerShell session Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux Follow the instructions on this page or install a Linux distro from the Microsoft Store (this is required for preparing a Debian sid WSL distro)

item.title: UEFI boot: how does that actually work, then?
item.description: This is the backup page for UEFI boot: how does that actually work, then? written by Adam Williamson on 2014-01-25 21:07 with Source Connet me if this page bothers you and I will delete it. It's AdamW Essay Time again! If you're looking for something short and snappy, look elsewhere. Kamil Paral kindly informs me I'm a chronic sufferer of Graphomania. Always nice to know what's wrong with you.
